View The Slideshow Photo: HBO There are many reasons why you might be choosing to tune into HBOâ€™s newest thriller of a mini-series Big Little Lies â€” the ridiculously talented cast, the promise of a compelling murder-mystery faithfully adapted from its source material, the petty mom-on-mom gossip. But if thereâ€™s one takeaway from the premiere episode, itâ€™s that the showâ€™s Monterey families own what can only be best described as the most gorgeous, real-estate-porn-worthy homes in all of California . (Seriously, someone give HBOâ€™s location-scouting team a raise.) Weâ€™ve compiled all of the multi-million-dollar properties on Big Little Lies so far for your viewing pleasure. Just remember what the show seems to be whispering to us: If it looks like Heaven, itâ€™s probably Hell.
